name: MaterialColorParameter
desc: The color parameter applied to a material.

items.name: static func == (MaterialColorParameter, MaterialColorParameter) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two color parameters are equal.

items.name: static func != (MaterialColorParameter, MaterialColorParameter) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two color parameters are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the color parameter by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the color parameter.
